pullRequest.title: Minor page optimizations
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds two new utility methods to Page:

copyPositions(int[] retainedPositions, int offset, int length) which mirrors getRegion
extractChannels(int[] channels) which creates a new page with arbitrary channel selection / reordering

The follow up commit then updates various operators and classes that explicitly created and manipulated Block arrays to use equivalent Page methods that avoid extra defensive copies.
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

commit.message: Add copyPositions and extractChannels utility methods to Page

nodes.bodyText: Should we validate the channel ranges?

commit.message:
Prefer builtin Page methods that avoid Block[] copies

Updates various operators and utilities that explicitly create and
manipulate Block arrays to use equivalent Page methods where
applicable and avoid defensively copying the Block array argument
